Avatar: Picture presents a male, middle aged character from a video game. He has a rather short, brown hair, with parting on the right, wears glasses and has a sparse facial hair.

Backdrop image: Picture of few small, mushroom-shaped jellyfish. They have many short, purple tentacles. I took this picture in the ZOO in Berlin, Germany.
